statements: DELETE FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';

DELETE FROM customer_reviews
WHERE review_score < 3 AND review_date < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM customer_reviews
WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' AND product_id = 100;
DELETE FROM ProductReviews WHERE review_id = 1 AND review_rating > 3;
DELETE FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_id = 2 AND feedback_rating < 2;
DELETE FROM ProductReviews WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe' AND ProductReviews.product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_rating < 3);
DELETE FROM CustomerReviews WHERE rating < 3 AND review_id IN (SELECT review_id FROM FeedbackHistory WHERE feedback_date < '2021-01-01');
DELETE FROM ProductImprovements WHERE product_id NOT IN (SELECT product_id FROM CustomerReviews);
DELETE FROM FeedbackHistory WHERE review_id IN (SELECT review_id FROM CustomerReviews) OR improvement_id IN (SELECT improvement_id FROM ProductImprovements WHERE implemented = True);
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
